Package cubeAssets

Class Cubie

java.lang.Object
cubeAssets.Cubie
public class Cubie extends Object
Represents a cubie (small cube) of a Rubik's cube with an associated position, faces, and a solved position. Provides methods for rotating the cubie and displaying it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cubie

      public Cubie(processing.core.PApplet sketch, processing.core.PMatrix3D matrix, int x, int y, int z, int facecounter, Settings setting)
      Constructs a new Cubie with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      sketch - The PApplet instance for rendering.
      matrix - The PMatrix3D for transformations.
      x - The x position of the cubie.
      y - The y position of the cubie.
      z - The z position of the cubie.
      facecounter - The face counter for assigning face ids.
      setting - The Settings object containing configuration.

  • Method Details

    • turnFacesX

      public void turnFacesX(int dir)
      Rotates the faces of the cubie around the X axis.
      Parameters:
      dir - The direction to rotate the faces (-1 for counterclockwise, 1 for clockwise).

    • turnFacesY

      public void turnFacesY(int dir)
      Rotates the faces of the cubie around the Y axis.
      Parameters:
      dir - The direction to rotate the faces (-1 for counterclockwise, 1 for clockwise).

    • turnFacesZ

      public void turnFacesZ(int dir)
      Rotates the faces of the cubie around the Z axis.
      Parameters:
      dir - The direction to rotate the faces (-1 for counterclockwise, 1 for clockwise).

      Updates the position of the cubie.
      Parameters:
      x - The new x position of the cubie.
      y - The new y position of the cubie.
      z - The new z position of the cubie.
